Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.cache

Class ValueCache<S>

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.cache.ValueCache<S>
Type Parameters:
S - the state that is stored in the cache
All Implemented Interfaces:
Owner
public abstract class ValueCache<S> extends Object implements Owner
Store data that must be generated/fetched remotely and cache the results for a set period of time.

      Create a new cache
      Parameters:
      name - the name, as presented to Prometheus
      ttl - the number of minutes an item will remain in cache

      protected abstract S fetch(Instant lastUpdated) throws Exception
      Fetch an item from the remote service (or generate it)
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the cached value
      Throws:

    • get

      public S get()
      Get an item from cache
      Returns:
      the value, if it was possible to fetch; the value may be stale if the remote end-point is in an error state

    • getStale

      public S getStale()
      Get an item from cache, but do not update it
      Returns:
      the last value put in the cache
